siteMetadata.title: Forum for Leadership & Reconciliation
siteMetadata.description: Forum for Leadership and Reconciliation (Forum) is a not-for-profit organization created in 2011 to support two existing projects: Renewing Our Minds (ROM) founded in 1999 and Economics, Diplomacy and Integrity (EDI) started in 2006.
siteMetadata.author: Andrew Weiss
